location: Dunnan Road Section 2, Lane 181, Da'an District - 285m from Zhongxiao Dunhua MRT
notes: Mid-range renovated unit (within 3 years) with 3BR/2BA layout in elevator building. Well-located near MRT with good ventilation and natural light. Includes balcony and full furnishings. For baby safety: balcony access should be assessed in person; rectangular layout suggests fewer awkward corners. No pets allowed. Requires 2-month deposit plus NT$1,750/month management fee.
